name: backend
description: A Node.js backend built with TypeScript

scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon --watch src --exec ts-node src/index.ts
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production pm2 start dist/index.js --name backend --no-daemon
scripts.prod: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --env production
